alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:50AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Friday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 AM CST Monday was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage the next few days. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 4.1 Mon 5 am CST 3.5 3.6 3.5 &&
